name: Police Pursuit - Satan Chase
description:
An ultimate thrill and old game of cop and thief continuous in Police Pursuit. You are in a car and you need to reach the finish line before the cop catches you. You need to keep calm when police reaches you. Pretend to be a normal citizen and do not cross the lane of the cop car.

You need to finish multiple levels before you can conquer the city. Collect coins as many as you can. On each level you ll be given a new car so cops cant recongnize you. All you need to do is to drive safe and relax and reach your target.

Feature
- Multiple Levels
- Multiple Cars. Each level has a different one
- Brilliant City
- Cool Sound Track
- HD Graphics
- OffRoad experience
